title: What the hell has dyrus done for this community aside for embarrassing NA on the world stage?
body:
And getting rumble nerfed?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ANAl9EEn-dyrus-abyssal-scepter

Roflmao @ the welfare item the tsm fangirls wants, while we're at it why not give Smitevicious a tribute by renaming a jungling item to his name?

This TSM idol worshiping has gots to stap.
